subject: Self Care
title: Open Awareness Meditation
description: A fast breakdown of Open Awareness Meditation for builders.

hook.text: Instead of focusing on one thing, you notice everything: sounds, thoughts, sensations. All at once.

buildup.text: Open awareness, or choiceless awareness, trains the mind to observe without selecting any single focus.

discovery.text: Thoughts arise and pass. Sounds appear and fade. You become the observer of the entire mental landscape.

twist.text: This style is harder than focused attention. Without a strong anchor, the mind can drift into daydreaming.

climax.text: Open awareness reveals that you are not your thoughts. You are the space in which thoughts happen.

punchline.text: You are the sky. Thoughts are just the weather.

quiz.question: What distinguishes open awareness from focused attention meditation?
options: It uses a specific anchor point
You observe everything without selecting a single focus
